mapper.select: SELECT p.product_id, CONCAT(info.file_nm,'.',file_format) as file_path, p.title, p.retail_price, p.sales_price, #{user_no} as user_no FROM tb_product p INNER JOIN tb_product_img im ON p.product_id = im.product_id INNER JOIN tb_img_file_info info ON im.img_no = info.img_no INNER JOIN tb_interested_list l ON p.product_id = l.product_id WHERE 1=1 AND l.user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_interested_list(user_no, product_id, reg_dt) VALUES
(#{item.user_no},#{item.product_id},NOW())
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE reg_dt = NOW()
